backend/main.mo: Actor managing broadcast sessions with scoreboard, events, captions, and lifecycle operations like start, setTeamIcons, and endSession.
backend/migration.mo: Stub migration module that returns an empty state without changes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs for two broadcaster start‑flow features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A prewritten set of file summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable setup defining color tokens and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for landing, broadcaster, viewer join, and viewer watch pages inside FootballLayout.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Broadc: UI button component for toggling the broadcaster's microphone with loading, error-retry, and enabled/disabled states.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Footba: Game control panel with a flag‑event dialog allowing selection of team and reason before submitting flag events.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Microp: Helper UI explaining microphone permission or device errors with a retry option.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Permis: Helper UI for camera permission or device errors with explanatory text and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Scoreb: Provides UI controls to edit and update scoreboard scores and team roles using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Sessio: Displays the session code with copy-to-clipboard functionality for sharing a broadcast.
frontend/src/components/events/EventFeed: Shows a scrollable list of game events with icons and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/events/FlagAnnou: Renders a styled overlay announcing a flag event on either side of the screen.
frontend/src/components/events/LatestEve: Temporarily displays the latest event in a top-center overlay that auto-hides.
frontend/src/components/layout/FootballL: Provides the main page layout with header, footer, branding, and social links.
frontend/src/components/scoreboard/Botto: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/scoreboard/OnCam: Shows an on-camera scoreboard bar with team icons, scores, and offense indicators.
frontend/src/components/scoreboard/Score: Wraps scoreboard-related content in a styled card with a title and optional icon.
frontend/src/components/system/Unsupport: Displays a warning card when the user's browser lacks required features for broadcasting.
frontend/src/components/viewer/ViewerSub: Shows viewer subtitles or a warning when captions are unavailable.
frontend/src/components/viewer/ViewerVid: Handles live stream video display with loading, error, ended, and waiting states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBroadcasterSession: Manages broadcaster session lifecycle, generating session codes and calling backend mutations to start or end sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useBroadcastMediaStre: Builds a combined broadcast MediaStream from video and optional microphone audio, handling mic toggling and track management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, loading stored identities and exposing login, logout, and status utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicrophone.ts: Handles microphone access, activation, errors, and media track management with configurable audio constraints.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for session metadata, events, scoreboard, and session mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionCode.ts: Stores and retrieves the current session code in localStorage with simple setters and clear functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionLifecycle.t: Derives session state (waiting, live, ended) based on metadata and loading status.
Implements speech-to-text using the browser SpeechRecognition API, managing listening state, transcript, and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimedFlagOverlay.t: Manages timed display of the latest unseen flag event and persists seen flags in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewerLiveStream.t: Handles viewer-side WebRTC setup for live video, tracks connection state, and reports signaling errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode overrides, and global background styling.
frontend/src/lib/teamIcons.ts: Provides team icon metadata and helpers to get icon info and scoreboard team names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BroadcasterPage.tsx: Main broadcaster interface managing camera, mic, captions, events, scoreboard, and flag overlays.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page offering navigation to broadcast or watch modes.
frontend/src/pages/ViewerJoinPage.tsx: Page for entering and validating a session code before joining a live stream.
frontend/src/pages/ViewerWatchPage.tsx: Viewer page that loads session data, events, scoreboard, captions, and displays video with dynamic overlays plus subtitle toggling and leave-session handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata outlining app purpose, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for a football-themed live streaming system.
